ygData.subject: Re: Hammer quest for a cleric friend
ygData.msgSnippet: I actually am very interested in this quest or whatever it is.  I have all the pieces I believe and would like to make the hammer.  I have many good cleric
ygData.messageBody:
I actually am very interested in this quest or whatever it is. I have all
the pieces I believe and would like to make the hammer. I have many good
cleric friends that I can pass it on to.

~Dyvim Kincaid
Stormriders of Cazic Thule

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Mifsud, Michael [mailto:Michael.Mifsud@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, June 09, 1999 12:17 AM
> To: 'warriors_eq@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Hammer quest for a cleric friend
>
>
> From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
>
> What exactly do you want to do? I had the mallet and you can combine the
> pieces together yourself to make it.
>
